findings.rationale: Absence of indemnification obligations may expose parties to significant liability without recourse, particularly in cases of breaches or legal disputes.
findings.evidence_quote: No indemnification obligations apply under this Agreement.

findings.rationale: The absence of audit rights limits the ability to verify compliance with the confidentiality obligations, which may lead to unaddressed breaches.
findings.evidence_quote: No audit rights are granted under this Agreement.

findings.rationale: Limiting liability except as required by law could lead to unexpected financial exposure in certain legal contexts.
findings.evidence_quote: Limitation of liability shall not apply to indemnification, except as required by applicable law.
